entry.title: Lab 1 (VM Setup)
entry.summary: This lab involved setting up our virtual machines and GitHub for the class. The process involved following directions on the given documentation to set up our environments properly for the class.

entry.title: Lab 2 (HTML Resume)
entry.summary: This lab involved creating a basic resume using HTML and CSS. We first had to design our resumes and transform them into proper HTML and CSS. We also had to deploy this to our virtual machines and GitHub.

entry.title: Lab 3 (Personal Website)
entry.summary: This lab involved creating an actual website for the course, with our labs and other basic content about ourselves. First, I created a site map for this lab, which involved planning for how I wanted to site to look, which pages direct to what, and etc. Then, we began building the website using HTML and CSS, and deploying it to our virtual machines and GitHub.

entry.title: Lab 4 (RSS and Atom Feed)
entry.summary: This lab involved building RSS and Atom feeds for the class, including links to our labs. The RSS and Atom feeds required specific items and styling to receive full credit.
